channel.title: Posts on Nicolas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nicolas

item.title: Color Hue
item.description: // p5.js const barWidth = 10; let lastBar = -1; function setup() { createCanvas(300, 160); colorMode(HSB, height, height, height); noStroke(); background(0); } function draw() { let whichBar = Math.floor(mouseX / barWidth); if (whichBar !== lastBar) { let barX = whichBar * barWidth; fill(mouseY, height, height); rect(barX, 0, barWidth, height); lastBar = whichBar; } }
